headline.main: R.A.F. UNITS RAID KASSALA 10 TIMES; Hits on Troops and Batteries at Post in Sudan Reported Macaaca Is Attacked MORE ITALIANS IN KENYA British Announce the Sinking of Two Submarines--Rome Claims a Destroyer

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Aug. 1--Royal Air Force bombers have raided Kassala ten times, the attacks lasting from dawn to dusk on Tuesday and continuing yesterday, the British announced. These raids were in retaliation against an Italian advance into Anglo-Egyptian Sudan territory.
